attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr PM,
I'm 18 years of age and even i can see the problems that the future brings. Global warming, lack of oil, water shortages, famine and other monsters from within pandoras box. All of the above problems are caused by the human race, and what sickens me is the way we deal with this. By patching up the holes of a sinking vessel. We need to tackle the problem of population with methods like birth control and other policies. The world is simply not large enough for all these people. This is a major problem in store for mankind in the future. Thanks

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
